name: User Segmentation Configuration
description: Configuration for segmenting users based on Google Play reviews

reviews.description: Array of review texts to analyze

max_segments.description: Maximum number of user segments to identify

include_marketing.description: Whether to include marketing approach suggestions

characteristics.description: Key characteristics of this user segment

needs.description: Primary needs and pain points of this segment

usage_patterns.description: Typical usage patterns for this segment

improvement_recommendations.description: Recommended product improvements for this segment

marketing_approach.description: Suggested marketing messaging for this segment

cross_segment_opportunities.description: Opportunities that could benefit multiple segments

segment_prioritization.description: Suggested prioritization of segments based on potential value

priority_reason.description: Reason for this segment's priority level

reviews: I use this app every day for work. It helps me track my sales targets and client meetings. Would be better if it integrated with Salesforce. The UI is a bit complex but I've gotten used to it.
Downloaded this for my small business to track inventory. It's simple enough for my needs but lacks some advanced features. The price is right though!
As a student, I find this app perfect for keeping track of assignments and group projects. The free version has all I need. Love the colorful interface!
I'm a busy mom using this to organize family activities and shopping lists. The shared lists feature is a lifesaver! Wish it had location-based reminders.
Using this in our corporate environment to manage team tasks. Need better admin controls and user permission settings. The reporting features are excellent though.

characteristics: Use the app for work/sales activities
